mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 1 THEN '방금 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 1 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) || '일 전' END AS CREATE_DATE, COUNT, STATUS, USER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 1 THEN '방금 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 1 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) || '일 전' END AS CREATE_DATE, CASE WHEN MODIFY_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN (SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 1 THEN '방금 전(수정됨)' WHEN (SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) * 24 < 1 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전(수정됨)' WHEN (SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전(수정됨)' ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE - MODIFY_DATE) || '일 전(수정됨)' END AS MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
